00067 extern const  void *pbuffer;
00068 extern        U8    data_to_transfer;

00076 void usb_user_endpoint_init(U8 conf_nb)

00080 
00087 Bool usb_user_read_request(U8 type, U8 request)
00088 {
00089   if ((type & 0x7F) == 0x21)  // Type: Class; Recipient: Interface
00090   {
00091     switch (request)
00092     {
00093     case DFU_DETACH:
00094       break;
00095 
00096     case DFU_DNLOAD:
00097       return usb_dfu_dnload();
00098 
00099     case DFU_UPLOAD:
00100       return usb_dfu_upload();
00101 
00102     case DFU_GETSTATUS:
00103       Usb_ack_setup_received_free();
00104       Usb_reset_endpoint_fifo_access(EP_CONTROL);
00105       Usb_write_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8, usb_dfu_status); // bStatus
00106       Usb_write_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8, 0);  // bwPollTimeout
00107       Usb_write_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8, 0);
00108       Usb_write_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8, 0);
00109       Usb_write_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8, usb_dfu_state);  // bState
00110       Usb_write_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8, 0);  // iString
00111       Usb_ack_control_in_ready_send();
00112       while (!Is_usb_control_out_received());
00113       Usb_ack_control_out_received_free();
00114       return TRUE;
00115 
00116     case DFU_GETSTATE:
00117       Usb_ack_setup_received_free();
00118       Usb_reset_endpoint_fifo_access(EP_CONTROL);
00119       Usb_write_endpoint_data(EP_CONTROL, 8, usb_dfu_state);  // bState
00120       Usb_ack_control_in_ready_send();
00121       while (!Is_usb_control_out_received());
00122       Usb_ack_control_out_received_free();
00123       return TRUE;
00124 
00125     case DFU_CLRSTATUS:
00126     case DFU_ABORT:
00127       Usb_ack_setup_received_free();
00128       usb_dfu_status = STATUS_OK;
00129       usb_dfu_state = STATE_dfuIDLE;
00130       Usb_ack_control_in_ready_send();
00131       while (!Is_usb_control_in_ready());
00132       return TRUE;
00133     }
00134   }
00135 
00136   usb_dfu_status = STATUS_errSTALLEDPKT;
00137   usb_dfu_state = STATE_dfuERROR;
00138   return FALSE;
00139 }
00140 
00141 
00145 Bool usb_user_get_descriptor(U8 type, U8 string)
00146 {
00147   pbuffer = NULL;
00148 
00149   switch (type)
00150   {
00151   case STRING_DESCRIPTOR:
00152     switch (string)
00153     {
00154     case LANG_ID:
00155       data_to_transfer = sizeof(usb_user_language_id);
00156       pbuffer = &usb_user_language_id;
00157       break;
00158 
00159     case MAN_INDEX:
00160       data_to_transfer = sizeof(usb_user_manufacturer_string_descriptor);
00161       pbuffer = &usb_user_manufacturer_string_descriptor;
00162       break;
00163 
00164     case PROD_INDEX:
00165       data_to_transfer = sizeof(usb_user_product_string_descriptor);
00166       pbuffer = &usb_user_product_string_descriptor;
00167       break;
00168 
00169     case SN_INDEX:
00170       data_to_transfer = sizeof(usb_user_serial_number);
00171       pbuffer = &usb_user_serial_number;
00172       break;
00173 
00174     default:
00175       break;
00176     }
00177     break;
00178 
00179   default:
00180     break;
00181   }
00182 
00183   return pbuffer != NULL;
00184 }
